name: adjust_volume
description: Adjust the volume by a percentage.

by.description: The amount in percentage points to adjust the volume by, which can be positive or negative, ensuring the final volume is clamped between 0 and 100.

setting.description: Specifies the volume setting to adjust (`ALARM`, `CALL`, `MEDIA`, `NOTIFICATION`, `RING`), where `UNSPECIFIED` or an omitted value adjusts all settings.

name: get
description: Get the current value of a device setting.

setting_type str.description: The device setting to retrieve, which must be one of the following values: `AIRPLANE_MODE`, `ALARM_VOLUME`, `AUTO_ROTATE`, `BATTERY`, `BATTERY_SAVER`, `BLUETOOTH`, `CALL_VOLUME`, `DO_NOT_DISTURB`, `FLASHLIGHT`, `HOT_SPOT`, `MEDIA_VOLUME`, `NETWORK`, `NFC`, `NIGHT_MODE`, `NOTIFICATION_VOLUME`, `RING_VOLUME`, `TALK_BACK`, `VOLUME`, `VIBRATION`, or `WIFI`.

name: get_app_notification_status
description: Get the current notification setting for a specific app.

app_name.description: The name of the app for which to retrieve notification settings.

name: get_device_insights
description: Generate device insights based on the user's current device state.

device_state_type.description: The type of device state for which to retrieve insights (`UNCATEGORIZED`, `BATTERY`, or `STORAGE`); if omitted or set to `UNCATEGORIZED`, general insights are returned.

name: get_installed_apps
description: Get all applications installed on the device, excluding their notification settings.

setting.description: The volume setting to mute, which must be `ALARM`, `CALL`, `MEDIA`, `NOTIFICATION`, `RING`, or `UNSPECIFIED`. If `UNSPECIFIED` or omitted, all volume settings are muted.

The toggleable device setting to turn off. Must be one of: "AIRPLANE_MODE", "AUTO_ROTATE", "BATTERY_SAVER", "BLUETOOTH", "DO_NOT_DISTURB", "FLASHLIGHT", "HOT_SPOT", "NETWORK", "NFC", "NIGHT_MODE", "TALK_BACK", "VIBRATION", or "WIFI".

Specifies the device setting to turn on, which must be one of the following: `"AIRPLANE_MODE"`, `"AUTO_ROTATE"`, `"BATTERY_SAVER"`, `"BLUETOOTH"`, `"DO_NOT_DISTURB"`, `"FLASHLIGHT"`, `"HOT_SPOT"`, `"NETWORK"`, `"NFC"`, `"NIGHT_MODE"`, `"TALK_BACK"`, `"VIBRATION"`, or `"WIFI"`.

name: open
description: Opens the settings page for a specified setting type.

setting_type.description: The specific device setting to open, provided as a string. If omitted or set to `UNSPECIFIED`, the general device settings page is opened. Use `UNSPECIFIED` for a generic request like "settings". Valid values include: "UNSPECIFIED", "ACCESSIBILITY", "ACCOUNT", "AIRPLANE_MODE", "ALARM_VOLUME", "APPLICATION", "APP_DATA_USAGE", "AUTO_ROTATE", "BARD", "BATTERY", "BATTERY_SAVER", "BIOMETRIC", "BLUETOOTH", "BLUETOOTH_PAIRING", "BRIGHTNESS", "CALL_VOLUME", "CAST", "DARK_THEME", "DATA_SAVER", "DATE_TIME", "DEVELOPER_OPTION", "DEVICE_INFO", "DISPLAY", "DO_NOT_DISTURB", "GEMINI", "GOOGLE_ASSISTANT", "HOT_SPOT", "INTERNAL_STORAGE", "LANGUAGE", "LOCATION", "LOCK_SCREEN", "MEDIA_VOLUME", "NETWORK", "NFC", "NIGHT_MODE", "NOTIFICATION_VOLUME", "RING_VOLUME", "TALK_BACK", "VOLUME", "VIBRATION", "WIFI".

name: set_app_notification_status
description: Set the notification setting for a specific app.

app_name.description: The name of the app to modify.

notifications.description: The notification state, which must be either `on` or `off`.

name: set_volume
description: Set the volume to a specific percentage.

to.description: The volume level as a percentage, from 0 to 100.

setting.description: Specifies the volume setting to modify, which can be `ALARM`, `CALL`, `MEDIA`, `NOTIFICATION`, or `RING`. If `UNSPECIFIED` or omitted, all volume settings are set.

name: unmute
description: Restores the device volume to default levels.

setting.description: The volume setting to unmute. If `None` or `"UNSPECIFIED"`, all settings are unmuted. Valid options and their restored volume levels are: `ALARM` (50), `CALL` (70), `MEDIA` (60), `NOTIFICATION` (40), and `RING` (80).
